segments.text: How do you usually spend your leisure time ? I mean , do you have any special interests out of your job ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course . You see , almost everyone has some kind of hobby
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , you ’ re quite right and what ’ s your hobby ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I like taking photos out of door .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , photography , It ’ s really a good hobby .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I usually develop and print all my own photos .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You yourself have a photo studio ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , simple as it is . t does work .
